#include <Python.h>
        int
        main(int argc, char *argv[])
        {
          Py_SetProgramName(argv[0]);  /* optional but recommended */
          Py_Initialize();
          PyRun_SimpleString(""from time import time,ctime\n""
                     ""print 'Today is',ctime(time())\n"");
          Py_Finalize();
          return 0;
        }
